item.title: Pfizer amps up push into obesity treatments with $4.9B deal for Metsera
item.description: Pfizer is doubling down on obesity treatments by spending $4.9 billion on the development-stage drugmaker Metsera

item.title: Asian shares are mostly higher after Wall Street's record week
item.description: Asian shares have finished mostly higher, cheered by a record-setting finish last week on Wall Street

item.title: Japanese automaker Nissan is developing self-driving technology
item.description: Japanese automaker Nissan is developing vehicles with self-driving technology as it works to turn around its struggling auto business
